code: import _objectSpread from"/Users/haihuynh/Documents/WEB/Reactjs/movies-series-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import{SEARCH_MOVIE,FETCH_MOVIES,FETCH_MOVIE,LOADING}from'../actions/types';var initialState={text:'',movies:[],loading:false,movie:[]};export default function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SEARCH_MOVIE:return _objectSpread({},state,{text:action.payload,loading:false});case FETCH_MOVIES:return _objectSpread({},state,{movies:action.payload,loading:false});case FETCH_MOVIE:return _objectSpread({},state,{movie:action.payload,loading:false});case LOADING:return _objectSpread({},state,{loading:true});default:return state;}};
